title: GRELIS Starts $100 Monthly Advertising Program Offering Unlimited Ad Clicks
text:
Global Real Estate Listing Search (GRELIS) has revolutionized the global real estate market again by launching an innovative new advertising program; $100 per month buys top site placement and unlimited ad clicks for each keyword selected.
Santa Barbara, CA (PRWEB) September 20, 2015
Scrappy, unfunded real estate startup GRELIS has done it again; they were the first to offer a comprehensive searchable database of global property listings via keywords and now they are offering advertisers unlimited ad clicks and top site placement for $100 per month, per keyword.
“As a frequent user of AdWords, generating traffic for my website became unsustainable; AdWords inflation was not running at the 8-12% claimed, but rather along the lines of 50% per year. There had to be a better model, and we decided to invent something completely new,” said GRELIS founder Tom Rapko .
By transforming the traditional pay-per-click internet keyword ad model into a rental agreement, GRELIS offers advertisers the ability to still target certain keywords, but also the commitment of top placement with unlimited click-throughs for their ads.
“As the top global real estate search engine, GRELIS wants to team-up with travel resorts, airlines, and leading mortgage companies, amongst other key team members, to make the user experience phenomenal. The keyword rental program is a huge factor in making that happen; GRELIS can now offer both the most relevant property listings and ancillary services at the same time,” Rapko added.
Rapko pointed out that there are already three ads running; one for a scuba diving operation in Indonesia , another for a travel agency in Colorado, and another for a real estate development firm in Baja, Mexico.
GRELIS is a timely search engine given that many Americans are still reeling from the 2008-2009 recession coupled with nearly two decades of wage stagnation. Realizing that the American Dream may now mean living overseas, GRELIS offers the opportunity to locate “that perfect home” anywhere in the world. The platform boasts over 30 million keyword search results with listings that fit neatly into every budget, from extravagant to “dirt cheap.”
About GRELIS: Founded in 2015 with a logo literally made from baby blocks, GRELIS was designed as a real estate search engine to find cool scuba diving locations; it has morphed into one of the largest server-busting real estate platforms on the internet with over 30,000,000 keyword search results supporting over 1,000,000 unique property listings worldwide.
